summary: This operator performs a logical XOR-operation.
details: Return true when the left-operand is true or the right-operand is true.
static-checks: The type of the left-operand must be either boolean or Boolean.
The type of the right-operand must be either boolean or Boolean.
example-1: module Main in examples;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val case1 = false ^ false;%0A    val case2 = false ^ true;%0A    val case3 = true ^ false;%0A    val case4 = true ^ true;%0A%0A    (F::println %22F ^ F = %22 .. case1);%0A    (F::println %22F ^ T = %22 .. case2);%0A    (F::println %22T ^ F = %22 .. case3);%0A    (F::println %22T ^ T = %22 .. case4);%0A}
F ^ F = false%0AF ^ T = true%0AT ^ F = true%0AT ^ T = false
